subtitle-bem-vindo: Specialized in clinical, surgical, aesthetic and laser dermatology
description1-head-office: The Headoffice is made up of qualified professionals who are passionate about what they do. Our mission is to enhance the natural beauty of each client, offering personalized and high quality services. We work with the best techniques and products on the market, always seeking satisfaction and the well-being of those who seek us out. Here, you can find facials, body treatments, waxing, massages, make-up, manicures, pedicures and much more. All this in a cozy and modern environment, where you can feel at home. Come and meet us and find out how we can transform your look and your self-esteem. The headoffice is waiting for you!
description2-head-office: **At the headoffice, we believe that beauty is a form of expression and personal appreciation. Therefore, we respect the individuality of each client and offer solutions that meet their needs and desires. We want you to feel good about yourself and your body, enhancing your natural beauty with our services. At the headoffice, you can find professionals who love what they do and who are always up-to-date to bring you the latest trends and news from the world of aesthetics. Come be part of our family and be surprised by the results!**
sub-title-missao: We provide the best experience in all our treatments
description-Missão: Our mission is to provide our customers with beauty and wellness experiences that exceed their expectations, through personalized services, qualified professionals and high quality products.  We want to be recognized as a reference, for excellence in service, for constant innovation and for the satisfaction of our customers!
description-Nossa equipa: Our team is made up of professionals who are passionate about what they do and committed to the quality of the services they provide. We have training and experience in several areas. We are always looking for new knowledge and techniques to offer our customers the best and most up-to-date on the market. We work in harmony and respect, valuing the differences and potential of each one. We are a family that cares about the well-being and happiness of our customers. We are the Headoffice team!

dialog.title: Message sent successfully!
dialog.description: We will contact you as soon as possible.

description-Excelência: always seek excellence in the quality of services provided and customer satisfaction.
description-Ética: act ethically and transparently in all operations, promoting customer confidence and business integrity.
description-Inovação: constantly seeking new solutions, techniques and technologies to improve and update the services offered to customers.
description-Atendimento ao cliente: prioritize personalized and welcoming service, offering a comfortable and safe environment for customers.
description-Respeito: valuing and respecting the individuality and diversity of each client, promoting an inclusive culture free of prejudice.
description-Responsabilidade social e am: adopt sustainable and socially responsible practices, seeking to contribute to the development of the local community and the planet as a whole.
CONHEÇA O PROCESSO DE PRODUÇÃO DA HEADOF: GET TO KNOW THE HEADOFFICE PRODUCTION PROCESS
description-footer: HeadOffice is a Beauty and Wellness center for all genders, offering more than 100 services that meet different conveniences, with the advantage that you can find them all in the same space. A visit to the HeadOffice allows you to take care of your hair, nails, face, body and mind.
description-Fale conosco: Send us your questions, requests or comments. We'll be happy to chat with you, and our customer support team will answer all your questions.
span: We promise not to use your contact information to send any type of SPAM.
description-Limpeza de Pele: Skin cleansing is an aesthetic procedure aimed at removing impurities, dead cells and other obstructions from the pores of the skin on the face. The end result is cleaner, smoother and more luminous skin, with fewer imperfections and a healthier appearance.
description-Aquapeel: Aquapeel is a non-invasive aesthetic skin treatment that uses hydrodermabrasion technology to cleanse, exfoliate, hydrate and nourish the skin. It is a treatment that uses a combination of jets of water and skin care solutions to remove impurities, cells dead skin and other pore clogs, as well as providing moisture and nourishment to the skin.
description-Radiofrequencia: In radiofrequency, electromagnetic waves are used to heat the deepest layers of the skin. The treatment is painless and non-invasive, making it a safe and effective option for those looking to improve the appearance of the skin. During the procedure, the high temperature stimulates blood circulation locally, producing collagen and elastin, resulting in improved skin appearance.
description-Hifu: HIFU is an aesthetic treatment that uses a high-intensity ultrasound beam to reduce localized fat and sagging skin in different areas of the body. HIFU causes the death of fat cells and stimulates the production of collagen and elastin, improving the firmness and elasticity of the skin HIFU is a non-invasive procedure, without cuts or needles, which leaves no scars or marks on the skin.
description-Peelings químicos: Chemical peels are aesthetic procedures that use the application of acids to the skin to remove damaged surface layers and promote cell regeneration. These acids can be of different types and concentrations, depending on the individual needs of the patient's skin and the purpose of the treatment.
description-Velashape rosto: The VelaShape is an aesthetic device that combines radiofrequency with infrared and a suction mechanism. The VelaShape treats different areas of the body, such as the thighs, flanks, buttocks and abdomen.
description-Drenagem linfática: Manual Lymphatic Drainage is a massage technique that stimulates the lymphatic system. The applied movements consist of light, smooth, rhythmic and precise pressure towards the lymph nodes. It is indicated by doctors and therapists in the recovery of postoperative edema, pre and postpartum.
description-Radiofrequencia corporal: Body radiofrequency is a treatment that uses electromagnetic waves to heat the deepest layers of the skin. The treatment is painless and non-invasive, making it a safe and effective option for anyone looking to improve the appearance of their skin.
description-Hifu corporal: Body HIFU is an aesthetic treatment that uses a high-intensity ultrasound beam to reduce localized fat and sagging skin in different areas of the body. scars or marks on the skin.
description-RF sculpt: RF Sculpt is an aesthetic treatment that combines radio frequency (RF) and focused high-intensity electromagnetic energy (HIFEM) to build muscle and reduce fat at the same time. RF Sculpt uses handpieces that emit RF waves and HIFEM to the desired area , causing supramaximal muscle contractions and an increase in temperature, which lead to the destruction of fat cells and the stimulation of collagen. The RF sculpt is a non-invasive and painless alternative to a surgical facelift, which can treat areas such as the abdomen, buttocks, arms, legs and thighs.
description-Vela shape: The VelaShape is an aesthetic device that combines radiofrequency with infrared and a suction mechanism. The VelaShape treats different areas of the body, such as the thighs, flanks, buttocks and abdomen.
description-Laiser podológico: Laser podology is a treatment that uses a laser beam to eliminate nail fungus (onychomycosis) and other foot problems such as calluses, warts, inflammation and scarring. The podiatric laser works by passing through the nail and adjacent tissue and being absorbed by the fungus pigment, causing heating that kills or damages the fungus organism.
description-Pressoterapia: Pressure therapy is a therapeutic technique that uses air pressure to improve blood circulation, reduce fluid retention and relieve the feeling of tired legs. It is commonly used to treat circulatory and aesthetic problems, but should be avoided by people with serious illnesses or specific medical conditions.
description-Lipolaser: The Lipolaser is a non-invasive aesthetic procedure that uses a low-intensity laser to help reduce localized fat in specific areas of the body, such as the abdomen, thighs, arms, waist and chin. intensity in the area to be treated, which causes the fat cells to break and release their contents to be eliminated by the body.The laser energy also stimulates the production of collagen, improving the appearance of the skin.
subtitle-Pedicure: Take care of your feet and nails.
subtitle-Massagem: Relax and relieve tension in your body
description-Manicure: We offer a variety of services, such as cutting, sanding, polishing, enamelling, cuticle removal, hydration, massage, exfoliation and decoration. In addition, we use quality and hygiene products, following all safety standards. We also have a pleasant and welcoming environment where you can relax and feel good.
description-Unhas de gel: Made from a gel material molded directly onto your natural nails, gel nails last longer than traditional false nails, require little maintenance, and help strengthen your nails. Customizable in size, shape and color, they are a practical and economical option for those who want to always have beautiful nails.
description-Verniz Gel: With high resistance and intense shine, the gel polish is applied like a nail polish, but is cured with UV or LED light, providing a durability of up to three weeks. Available in a variety of colors and finishes, gel polish is the right choice for anyone who wants impeccable and practical nails.
description-Pedicure: A combination of beauty and health care, a pedicure helps keep your nails healthy and well-trimmed, as well as treating and preventing calluses and other common foot problems. With relaxing massages and exfoliation, a pedicure is the perfect way to pamper your feet and feel refreshed and refreshed.
description-Massagem: A variety of techniques and styles, massage helps improve blood circulation, reduce stress and muscle soreness, and improve your overall quality of life. If you are looking for some time to disconnect and pamper yourself, massage is the right choice for you. Try it and feel the difference in your body and mind.
description-Delipação cera/linha: An efficient and safe technique, waxing/threading removes hair from the root, leaving your skin smooth and free of unwanted hair. Available for different parts of the body, waxing/threading is a practical and economical option for anyone who wants to feel more confident and comfortable with their skin. Try it and feel the difference.
description-Epilação laiser: A pulsed light treatment, laser hair removal permanently removes hair, leaving your skin smooth and hair-free for a long time. It's a safe and virtually painless option, allowing you to get the results you want without discomfort. With laser epilation, you can have smooth, beautiful skin without worrying about unwanted hair.
description-Micropigmentação ou tatuagem: A pigmentation technique similar to tattooing, micropigmentation is used to fill in eyebrows, outline eyes or lips, and even correct scars. With lasting results of up to two years, micropigmentation is a practical and convenient option for those who want to enhance their natural beauty. Try it and feel the difference in your appearance and confidence.
description-Hidragloss - Hidratação prof: The technique is performed using a device that combines hydration with an infusion of hyaluronic acid, which is a natural component of the body that helps keep the skin hydrated and healthy. The result is a younger, healthier and more beautiful look, as well as a long-lasting feeling of hydration on the lips.
description-Lash Lifting - Alinhamento e: The technique involves the use of a special formulation gel that helps lift and curl the hair naturally, without the need for false eyelashes. The result is a more natural look, enhancing the beauty of your own lashes. Lash Lifting is an excellent option for those looking for a more expressive and striking look.
description-Brow Lamination - Sobrancelh: It is a process that uses chemicals to change the texture and direction of the hairs on the eyebrows, leaving them more voluminous, uniform and with a hairstyle appearance. The end result is a more defined and voluminous appearance, giving the brows a neater, fuller look. The duration of the treatment can vary according to the type of product used and the technique of the professional, but it usually lasts from four to six weeks.
benefit1-Limpeza de Pele: Removes impurities, dead cells and other pore obstructions
benefit2-Limpeza de Pele: Improves the general appearance of the skin of the face, leaving it cleaner, smoother and healthier
benefit3-Limpeza de Pele: Stimulates cell renewal, helping to improve the appearance of scars and blemishes
benefit4-Limpeza de Pele: Improves absorption of skin care products
benefit5-Limpeza de Pele: Reduces the appearance of enlarged pores
benefit1-aguapeel: Removes impurities and dead skin cells
benefit2-aguapeel: Moisturizes and nourishes the skin, leaving it looking healthier and brighter
benefit3-aguapeel: Reduces inflammation and prevents the formation of acne lesions
benefit4-aguapeel: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
benefit6-aguapeel: The results are visible immediately after the treatment
benefit1-hifu: Removes dead cells and skin impurities
benefit2-hifu: Reduces blemishes, acne scars, fine wrinkles
benefit3-hifu: Stimulates the production of collagen and elastin in the skin
benefit4-hifu: Helps control skin oiliness and reduce acne
benefit5-hifu: Safe and no significant recovery time
benefit1-peelings: Removes dead cells and skin impurities
benefit2-peelings: Reduces blemishes, acne scars, fine wrinkles
benefit3-peelings: Stimulates the production of collagen and elastin in the skin
benefit4-peelings: Helps control skin oiliness and reduce acne
benefit5-peelings: Safe and no significant recovery time
benefit1-velashape: Reduces skin sagging and localized fat
benefit3-HIFU corporal: Suitable for facial and body treatments
benefit4-HIFU corporal: Longer-lasting results in just a few sessions
benefit3-RF sculpt: Reaches the deepest layers of skin and fat
benefit1-VelaShape: Reduces skin sagging and localized fat
benefit1-Laiser podológico: Fast and effective in eliminating nail fungus
benefit3-Laiser podológico: No damage to nail or skin and no recovery period
benefit5-Laiser podológico: It has an anti-inflammatory and analgesic action, relieving pain caused by calluses, warts, heel spurs and other foot inflammations.
benefit3-Pressoterapia: Relieves the feeling of tired and swollen legs
benefit4-Pressoterapia: Helps reduce cellulite and improves skin appearance
benefit5-Pressoterapia: Helps in the treatment of lymphedema and venous edema
benefit6-Pressoterapia: Helps in the treatment of varicose veins
benefit7-Pressoterapia: Helps with recovery after intense physical activity
benefit3-Lipolaser: It is non-invasive and requires no recovery time
description-Ácido hialurónico: Hyaluronic acid is a substance that naturally exists in our body and has the ability to retain water in the skin, keeping it hydrated, firm and elastic.
benefit2-Ácido hialurónico: Increases skin volume, especially in areas that tend to lose fat over time, such as cheekbones and lips
benefit3-Ácido hialurónico: Relieves joint pain by improving joint lubrication and cushioning, preventing or treating problems such as osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis or osteodystrophy
benefit4-Ácido hialurónico: Improves skin healing by facilitating its cell regeneration
description-Toxina botulínica: Botulinum toxin is a substance produced by the bacterium Clostridium botulinum. This toxin is known for its ability to cause muscle paralysis and is often used in medical and cosmetic treatments.
benefit4-Toxina botulínica: Helps in the treatment of migraines
description-Fios tensores: Tension threads are a minimally invasive facial rejuvenation technique that uses small suture threads to lift and support the skin on the face, neck and other areas of the body. Over time, the threads stimulate collagen production in the treated area, which helps strengthen and support the skin. The result is a younger, firmer appearance with fewer lines and wrinkles.
benefit1-Fios tensores: Lifting effect: lift and support sagging skin
benefit2-Fios tensores: Minimally invasive, fast and safe, with little recovery time required
benefit4-Fios tensores: It can be used on different areas including the face, neck, arms, thighs and buttocks
description-Biostimulators de colagénio: Discover how you can have a firmer, fuller face or butt with less cellulite and stretch marks with the use of collagen biostimulators! This non-invasive technique is an excellent option for those who want to improve the appearance of their face without plastic surgery or implants.
benefit2-Biostimulators de colagénio: Softens stretch marks and improves skin texture
benefit4-Biostimulators de colagénio: Progressive and natural results with lasting effects
benefit5-Biostimulators de colagénio: Safe and with little recovery time required
description-Brushing: Brushing is a finishing technique that transforms your hair into a work of art. With precise and delicate movements, our professionals model your hair, providing a sophisticated and elegant look. With Brushing, you can create different styles of hair, from classic and elegant to modern and stripped. In addition, this technique helps reduce frizz, leaving your hair silky and shiny. Straight, wavy or curled hair, Brushing is a versatile technique that can be applied to all types of hair.
description-Cor 2 em 1: Imagine being able to have two hair colors in a single technique! With the Color 2 in 1 technique, you can have the color you've always wanted, without having to choose between two options. This unique technique combines two dye colors to create an amazing effect on your hair. It is a technique that allows the creation of bold contrasts or smooth transitions between the chosen colors. The result is a modern and sophisticated look that will make you feel even more beautiful and confident. In addition, the 2 in 1 Color technique is customized for each client, taking into account the skin tone, face shape and lifestyle of each one.
description-Balayagem: Balayage is perfect for those who want to add a touch of luminosity and depth to their hair. With Balayage, it is possible to create a gradient effect on the strands, making them lighter at the ends and darker at the roots. It is a technique that provides a natural look, as if the hair had been illuminated by the sun Balayage can be applied to all types of hair, from the straightest to the most wavy.
description-Madeixas: Highlights are a coloring technique that gives more life and luminosity to the hair, creating a modern and sophisticated look. With the highlights, it is possible to create a thread effect, which can be more subtle or more daring, depending on the style of each one. It is a technique that allows the creation of bold contrasts or smooth transitions between the chosen colors. The locks technique can be applied to all types of hair, from the straightest to the curliest.
description-Mechas criativas: If you are looking for a modern and unique look, creative locks are perfect for you! With the creative locks, it is possible to create an effect of colored locks, which can be more subtle or bolder, depending on the style of each one. It is a technique that allows the creation of bold contrasts or smooth transitions between the chosen colors. Have amazing hair, full of style and personality! Here at Headoffice, we are ready to serve you and transform your look in a unique and exclusive way.
description-Extensions: Hair extensions are human hair that can be added to natural hair to increase its length, volume, texture or color. They can be applied using various techniques such as braiding, sewing, clipping or gluing. The choice of hair extension depends on the person's natural hair type, the desired result and the preferred application technique. It is important to choose a type of extension that is safe and comfortable for your hair and scalp.
benefit1-Balayagem: Get an even clearer reflection with a natural look
benefit2-Balayagem: Subtle and delicate change in the color of their hair
